name.japanese: 海軍戦艦（エニエス・ロビー）

description: A Marine battleship positioned at Enies Lobby where Luffy and Rob Lucci conduct their intense battle. The ship becomes the primary battleground for their fight and is subjected to massive damage from both combatants' attacks as well as bombardment from other Marine vessels.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Lucci Battle Continues
keyEvents.description: The Marine battleship serves as the arena for the continuation of Luffy and Lucci's epic battle, with both combatants unleashing devastating attacks that damage the vessel.
keyEvents.significance: The neutral ground where the climactic battle of the Enies Lobby arc unfolds.

keyEvents.title: Gigant Axe Destroys Part of Ship
keyEvents.description: Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Gigant Axe attack destroys a significant portion of the Marine battleship and knocks out numerous Marines.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the collateral damage of the Luffy vs Lucci battle.

keyEvents.title: Rankyaku: Gaicho Cleaves Through Hull
keyEvents.description: Lucci's Rankyaku: Gaicho cuts through the iron hull of the Marine battleship, showcasing the devastating power of his Rokushiki techniques.
keyEvents.significance: Shows that the ship is being destroyed from both sides of the battle.

keyEvents.title: Onigumo Orders Ship Bombardment
keyEvents.description: Vice-Admiral Onigumo orders the battleship to be fired upon despite it being full of his own men, in an attempt to eliminate Luffy.
keyEvents.significance: The ship becomes a target for friendly fire, illustrating the ruthlessness of Absolute Justice.

statusHistory.reason: Sustaining heavy damage from Luffy and Lucci's battle and Marine bombardment

name.japanese: エニエス・ロビー地下トンネル

description: The underground tunnel system beneath Enies Lobby that has been reinforced with special materials, making the walls extremely difficult to break through. These tunnels become death traps when Enies Lobby begins flooding after the Buster Call.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Trapped by Flooding
keyEvents.description: Zoro, Sanji, Nami, Chopper, Kokoro, and Chimney find themselves trapped in the reinforced underground tunnels as water rapidly floods in. Zoro discovers he cannot cut through the specially strengthened walls.
keyEvents.significance: Creates a life-threatening situation for half the crew, adding urgency beyond the main battle.

statusHistory.reason: Enies Lobby destruction causing water infiltration

name.japanese: 不明の王国（ルッチの回想）

description: An unnamed kingdom that was invaded by pirates 15 years before the main story. This kingdom was the site of the infamous incident where 13-year-old Rob Lucci killed 500 hostages. The kingdom's soldiers were captured and held for ransom, with the pirate captain demanding to be made the new king.

keyEvents.title: Kingdom Under Pirate Invasion
keyEvents.description: Flashback shows the kingdom 15 years ago when it was invaded by pirates who took 500 soldiers hostage, setting the stage for Lucci's dark mission.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Lucci's Dark Justice philosophy was born through horrific violence.

keyEvents.title: Lucci Murders 500 Hostages
keyEvents.description: Young Lucci systematically killed all 500 hostages in this kingdom, establishing his reputation as a ruthless assassin.
keyEvents.significance: The defining moment of Lucci's character and the birthplace of his Dark Justice ideology.

statusHistory.reason: Status after the incident is unknown
